tweet: The difference between gold and Bitcoin? Gold is a commodity, occupying space, with mass, temperature, shape. Bitcoin is an idea, made manifest through a series of numbers, with no true location or substance - a clever concept with infinite fluidity. To compare them is madness.
UPDATE: Bitcoin still not dead.  Now up 135% in 2019. 🔥
